text: I am trying to add fields in a module in the fields.json, but when the changes are uploaded no new fields are being created, the HTML I edited to reflect those new fields, the HTML is appearing but no data is coming through the HTML because the fields are not getting uploaded to HubSpot, is this a known issue with local development?
Actually, after looking at the response seems like the field IDs were duplicated so there was an error, I  thought fields IDs were not even really being used as a main element identifier
